item.title: My ZSH Configuration
item.description: ZSH! Below you can find the setup that I’ve found very comfortable while still maintaining a relatively minimal terminal experience. Confidential environment variables and aliases have been omitted to maintain basic operational security. This post will be edited every time a major revision is made. Customizations of Note Plugin Manager: Antibody cat Alternative: bat Theme: lambda-gitster Current .zshrc Configuration export ZSH="/Users/michaelpeters/.oh-my-zsh" export PATH=/usr/local/git/bin:$PATH ZSH_THEME="lambda-gitster" DISABLE_UPDATE_PROMPT="true" COMPLETION_WAITING_DOTS="true" DISABLE_UNTRACKED_FILES_DIRTY="true" source $ZSH/oh-my-zsh.sh source <(antibody init) antibody bundle < ~/.
